titles.title: PROTECT Act of 2020
PROTECT Act of 2020
Providing Resources for Ongoing Training and Education in Cyber Technologies Act of 2020
A bill to authorize the Cybersecurity Education Training Assistance Program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary:
Providing Resources for Ongoing Training and Education in Cyber Technologies Act of 2020 or the PROTECT Act of 2020
This bill provides statutory authority for the Cybersecurity Education and Training Assistance Program.
